title: Ticket #4349: dprintf should print errno if it can't open/create log file
description:
If dprintf can't create/open the appropriate file, you get a message like this: 

  05/07/14 16:20:32 Can't open "/job_dagman_basic.dag.dagman.out"
  ERROR "Cannot open log file '/job_dagman_basic.dag.dagman.out'" at line 208
  in file /u/w/e/wenger/cb/git4/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_utils/dprintf_setup.cpp

It would be really useful to get the errno value in that message.
creator: wenger
